2.0.0.en: Update app to SDK3 to make it compatible to Homey Pro (Early '23)

2.1.0.en: Added possibility to add PIN codes along with the user mapping, and a maintenance button for sending them to the lock

2.1.1.en: Added polling interval for fetching the door lock status in case it is out of sync

2.1.2.en: Fixed default settings for triggering "Someone unlocked the door" flow cards

2.1.3.en: Set default polling interval for dor lock status to 60 minutes

2.2.0.en: Added action card for updating lock status, and removed polling

2.2.1.en: Improved pairing instructions and general information in the app

2.2.2.en: Fetch the Z-Wave version from the lock on startup, and remove the need for index mode setting
